20110126030153.000|20110126030157.000|CC1|HANDS OF TERRORISTS.            
20110126030157.000|20110126030158.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]                    
20110126030158.000|20110126030200.000|CC1|>> BECAUSE OF A DIPLOMATIC      
20110126030200.000|20110126030203.000|CC1|EFFORT TO INSIST THAT IRAN MEET 
20110126030203.000|20110126030207.000|CC1|ITS OBLIGATIONS, THE IRANIAN    
20110126030207.000|20110126030208.000|CC1|[TKPWO-FPL/] NOW FACES TOUGHER  
20110126030208.000|20110126030210.000|CC1|SANCTIONS THAN EVER BEFORE.

20110126030213.000|20110126030217.000|CC1|STAND WITH ALLIED NORTH KOREA

20110126030219.000|20110126030220.000|CC1|COMMITMENT TO ABANDON NUCLEAR   
20110126030220.000|20110126030221.000|CC1|WEAPONS.                        
20110126030221.000|20110126030225.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]                    
20110126030225.000|20110126030226.000|CC1|>> THIS IS JUST A PART OF HOW   
20110126030226.000|20110126030229.000|CC1|WE'RE SHAPING A WORLD THAT      
20110126030229.000|20110126030232.000|CC1|FAVORS PEACE AND PROSPERITY.    
20110126030232.000|20110126030234.000|CC1|BUT OUR EUROPEAN ALLIESES       
20110126030234.000|20110126030236.000|CC1|REVITALIZED NATO AND INCREASED  
20110126030236.000|20110126030237.000|CC1|OUR COOPERATION ON EVERYTHING   
20110126030237.000|20110126030238.000|CC1|FROM COUNTER TERRORISM TO       
20110126030238.000|20110126030240.000|CC1|MISSILE DEFENSE.                
20110126030240.000|20110126030243.000|CC1|WE'VE RESET OUR RELATIONSHIP    
20110126030243.000|20110126030245.000|CC1|WITH RUSSIA, STRENGTHENED ASIA  
20110126030245.000|20110126030246.000|CC1|LINETIONVS, BUILT NEW           
20110126030246.000|20110126030247.000|CC1|PARTNERSHIPS WITH NATIONS LIKE  
20110126030247.000|20110126030249.000|CC1|INDIA.                          
20110126030249.000|20110126030251.000|CC1|THIS MARCH I WILL TRAVEL TO     
20110126030251.000|20110126030253.000|CC1|BRAZIL, CHILE AND EL SALVADOR   
20110126030253.000|20110126030255.000|CC1|TO FORGE NEW ALLIANCES ACROSS   
20110126030255.000|20110126030257.000|CC1|THE AMERICAS.                   
20110126030257.000|20110126030259.000|CC1|AROUND THE GLOBE WE'RE STANDING 
20110126030259.000|20110126030302.000|CC1|WITH THOSE WHO TAKE             
20110126030302.000|20110126030304.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY, HELPING FARMERS 
20110126030304.000|20110126030306.000|CC1|GROW MORE FOOD, SUPPORTING      
20110126030306.000|20110126030308.000|CC1|DOCTORS WHO CARE FOR THE SICK,  
20110126030308.000|20110126030310.000|CC1|AND COMBATING THE CORRUPTION    
20110126030310.000|20110126030312.000|CC1|THAT CAN ROB A SOCIETY AND ROB  
20110126030312.000|20110126030314.000|CC1|PEOPLE OF OPPORTUNITY.          
20110126030314.000|20110126030316.000|CC1|NOW, RECENT EVENTS HAVE SHOWN   
20110126030316.000|20110126030320.000|CC1|US THAT WHAT SETS US APART MUST 
20110126030320.000|20110126030321.000|CC1|NOT JUST BE OUR POWER.          
20110126030321.000|20110126030323.000|CC1|IT MUST ALSO BE THE PURPOSE     
20110126030323.000|20110126030327.000|CC1|BEHIND IT.                      
20110126030327.000|20110126030329.000|CC1|IN SOUTH SUDAN, WITH OUR        
20110126030329.000|20110126030330.000|CC1|ASSISTANCE, THE PEOPLE WERE     
20110126030330.000|20110126030331.000|CC1|FINALLY ABLE TO VOTE FOR        
20110126030331.000|20110126030333.000|CC1|INDEPENDENCE AFTER YEARS OF WAR.
20110126030333.000|20110126030335.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]                    
20110126030335.000|20110126030336.000|CC1|>> THOUSANDS LINED UP BEFORE    
20110126030336.000|20110126030339.000|CC1|DAWN.                           
20110126030339.000|20110126030343.000|CC1|PEOPLE DANCED IN THE STREETS.   
20110126030343.000|20110126030346.000|CC1|ONE MAN WHO LOST FOUR OF HIS    
20110126030346.000|20110126030347.000|CC1|BROTHERS AT WAR SUMMED UP THE   
20110126030347.000|20110126030348.000|CC1|SCENE AROUND HIM.               
20110126030348.000|20110126030350.000|CC1|THIS WAS A BATTLE FIELD FOR     
20110126030350.000|20110126030351.000|CC1|MOST OF MY LIFE, HE SAID.       
20110126030351.000|20110126030352.000|CC1|NOW WE WANT TO BE FREE.         
20110126030352.000|20110126030358.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]

20110126030400.000|20110126030406.000|CC1|BE FREE IN TUNISIA.

20110126030414.000|20110126030415.000|CC1|PEOPLE.

20110126030435.000|20110126030438.000|CC1|THE THINGS WE'VE STRUGGLED FOR

20110126030441.000|20110126030442.000|CC1|HEARTS OF PEOPLE EVERYWHERE,    
20110126030442.000|20110126030444.000|CC1|AND WE MUST ALWAYS REMEMBER

20110126030445.000|20110126030446.000|CC1|BORNE THE GREATEST BURDEN IN    
20110126030446.000|20110126030448.000|CC1|THIS STRUGGLE ARE THE MEN AND   
20110126030448.000|20110126030449.000|CC1|WOMEN WHO SERVE OUR COUNTRY.    
20110126030449.000|20110126030537.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]

20110126030539.000|20110126030541.000|CC1|ONE VOICE IN REAFFIRMING OUR    
20110126030541.000|20110126030542.000|CC1|NATION ASK UNITED IN SUPPORT OF

20110126030544.000|20110126030545.000|CC1|LET US SERVE THEM AS WELL AS    
20110126030545.000|20110126030547.000|CC1|THEY'VE SERVED US, BY GIVING    
20110126030547.000|20110126030548.000|CC1|THEM THE EQUIPMENT THEY NEED,   
20110126030548.000|20110126030549.000|CC1|BY PROVIDING THEM WITH THE CARE 
20110126030549.000|20110126030551.000|CC1|AND BENEFITS THAT THEY HAVE     
20110126030551.000|20110126030553.000|CC1|EARNED, AND BY ENLISTING OUR

20110126030555.000|20110126030558.000|CC1|BUILDING ALL NATIONS.           
20110126030558.000|20110126030601.000|CC1|OUR TROOPS COME FROM EVERY      
20110126030601.000|20110126030603.000|CC1|CORNER OF THIS COUNTRY.         
20110126030603.000|20110126030607.000|CC1|THEY'RE BLACK, WHITE, LATINO,   
20110126030607.000|20110126030608.000|CC1|ASIAN, NATIVE AMERICAN.         
20110126030608.000|20110126030612.000|CC1|THEY ARE CHRISTIAN AND HINDU,   
20110126030612.000|20110126030613.000|CC1|JEWISH AND MUSLIM.

20110126030615.000|20110126030616.000|CC1|THEM ARE GAY.

20110126030618.000|20110126030620.000|CC1|WILL BE FORBIDDEN FROM SERVING  
20110126030620.000|20110126030621.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY THEY LOVE BECAUSE   
20110126030621.000|20110126030622.000|CC1|OF WHO THEY LOVE.               
20110126030622.000|20110126030639.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]                    
20110126030639.000|20110126030642.000|CC1|>> AND WITH THAT CHANGE, I CALL 
20110126030642.000|20110126030644.000|CC1|ON ALL OUR COLLEGE CAMPUSES TO  
20110126030644.000|20110126030647.000|CC1|OPEN THEIR DOORS TO OUR         
20110126030647.000|20110126030648.000|CC1|MILITARY RECRUITERS AND ROTC.   
20110126030648.000|20110126030652.000|CC1|IT IS TIME TO LEAVE BEHIND THE  
20110126030652.000|20110126030652.000|CC1|BATTLES OF THE PAST.

20110126030653.000|20110126030655.000|CC1|>> IT IS TIME TO MOVE FORWARD   
20110126030655.000|20110126030655.000|CC1|AS ONE NATION.                  
20110126030655.000|20110126030706.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]                    
20110126030706.000|20110126030709.000|CC1|>> WE SHOULD HAVE NO ALLUSIONS  
20110126030709.000|20110126030714.000|CC1|ABOUT THE WORK AHEAD OF US.     
20110126030714.000|20110126030715.000|CC1|REFORMING OUR SCHOOLS, CHANGING 
20110126030715.000|20110126030721.000|CC1|THE WAY WE USE ENERGY, REDUCING 
20110126030721.000|20110126030722.000|CC1|OUR DEFICIT... NONE OF THIS     
20110126030722.000|20110126030723.000|CC1|WILL BE EASY.                   
20110126030723.000|20110126030726.000|CC1|ALL OF IT WILL TAKE TIME.       
20110126030726.000|20110126030729.000|CC1|AND IT WILL BE HARDER BECAUSE   
20110126030729.000|20110126030736.000|CC1|WE WILL ARGUE ABOUT EVERYTHING. 
20110126030736.000|20110126030739.000|CC1|THE COSTS, THE DETAILS, THE     
20110126030739.000|20110126030742.000|CC1|LETTER OF EVERY LAW.            
20110126030742.000|20110126030744.000|CC1|OF COURSE, SOME COUNTRIES DON'T 
20110126030744.000|20110126030745.000|CC1|HAVE THIS PROBLEM.              
20110126030745.000|20110126030746.000|CC1|IF THE CENTRAL GOVERNMENT WANTS 
20110126030746.000|20110126030748.000|CC1|A RAILROAD, THEY BUILD A        
20110126030748.000|20110126030750.000|CC1|RAILROAD, NO MATTER HOW MANY    
20110126030750.000|20110126030752.000|CC1|HOMES GET BULLDOZED.            
20110126030752.000|20110126030754.000|CC1|IF THEY DON'T WANT A BAD STORY  
20110126030754.000|20110126030755.000|CC1|IN THE NEWSPAPER, IT DOESN'T    
20110126030755.000|20110126030759.000|CC1|GET WRITTEN.                    
20110126030759.000|20110126030801.000|CC1|AND YET AS CONTENTIOUS AND      
20110126030801.000|20110126030804.000|CC1|FRUSTRATING AND MESSY AS OUR    
20110126030804.000|20110126030805.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY CAN SOMETIMES BE, I   
20110126030805.000|20110126030807.000|CC1|KNOW THERE ISN'T A PERSON HERE

20110126030840.000|20110126030843.000|CC1|POLICY, BUT WE ALL BELIEVE IN   
20110126030843.000|20110126030845.000|CC1|THE RIGHTS ENSHRINED IN OUR

20110126030900.000|20110126030902.000|CC1|IS A COUNTRY WHERE ANYTHING IS  
20110126030902.000|20110126030904.000|CC1|POSSIBLE, NO MATTER WHO YOU     
20110126030904.000|20110126030906.000|CC1|ARE, NO MATTER WHERE YOU COME   
20110126030906.000|20110126030909.000|CC1|FROM.                           
20110126030909.000|20110126030910.000|CC1|THAT DREAM IS WHY I CAN STAND   
20110126030910.000|20110126030914.000|CC1|HERE BEFORE YOU TONIGHT.        
20110126030914.000|20110126030916.000|CC1|THAT DREAM IS WHY A WORKING     
20110126030916.000|20110126030918.000|CC1|CLASS KID FROM SCRANTON CAN SIT 
20110126030918.000|20110126030918.000|CC1|BEHIND ME.                      
20110126030918.000|20110126030920.000|CC1|[LAUGHTER]                      
20110126030920.000|20110126030927.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]

20110126030929.000|20110126030931.000|CC1|WHO BEGAN BY SWEEPING THE       
20110126030931.000|20110126030932.000|CC1|FLOORS OF HIS FATHER'S

20110126030934.000|20110126030935.000|CC1|SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE IN THE     
20110126030935.000|20110126030937.000|CC1|GREATEST NATION ON EARTH.       
20110126030937.000|20110126030955.000|CC1|[CHEERING AND APPLAUDING]       
20110126030955.000|20110126030958.000|CC1|>> THAT DREAM, THAT AMERICAN    
20110126030958.000|20110126031000.000|CC1|DREAM, IS WHAT DROVE THE ALLEN  
20110126031000.000|20110126031002.000|CC1|BROTHERS TO REINVENT THE        
20110126031002.000|20110126031005.000|CC1|ROOFING COMPANY FOR A NEW ERA.  
20110126031005.000|20110126031008.000|CC1|IT'S WHAT DROVE THOSE STUDENTS  
20110126031008.000|20110126031009.000|CC1|AT FORSYTHE TECH TO LEARN A NEW 
20110126031009.000|20110126031010.000|CC1|SKILL AND WORK TOWARDS THE      
20110126031010.000|20110126031011.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110126031011.000|20110126031015.000|CC1|AND THAT DREAM IS THE STORY OF  
20110126031015.000|20110126031019.000|CC1|A SMALL BUSINESS OWNER NAMED    
20110126031019.000|20110126031020.000|CC1|BRANDON FISHER.                 
20110126031020.000|20110126031024.000|CC1|BRANDON STARTED A COMPANY IN    
20110126031024.000|20110126031025.000|CC1|BERLIN, PENNSYLVANIA THAT       
20110126031025.000|20110126031027.000|CC1|SPECIALIZES IN A NEW KIND OF    
20110126031027.000|20110126031030.000|CC1|DRILLING TECHNOLOGY.  AND ONE   
20110126031030.000|20110126031032.000|CC1|DAY LAST SUMMER HE SAW THE NEWS 
20110126031032.000|20110126031035.000|CC1|THAT HALFWAY ACROSS THE WORLD,  
20110126031035.000|20110126031038.000|CC1|33 MEN WERE TRAPPED IN A        
20110126031038.000|20110126031040.000|CC1|CHILEAN MINE, AND NO ONE KNEW   
20110126031040.000|20110126031044.000|CC1|HOW TO SAVE THEM.               
20110126031044.000|20110126031045.000|CC1|BUT BRANDON THOUGHT HIS COMPANY 
20110126031045.000|20110126031047.000|CC1|COULD HELP, AND SO HE DESIGNED  
20110126031047.000|20110126031050.000|CC1|A RESCUE THAT WOULD COME TO BE  
20110126031050.000|20110126031054.000|CC1|KNOWN AS PLAN B.                
20110126031054.000|20110126031057.000|CC1|HIS EMPLOYEES AROUND THE CLOCK  
20110126031057.000|20110126031058.000|CC1|TO MANUFACTURE THE NECESSARY    
20110126031058.000|20110126031100.000|CC1|DRILLING COMPANY, AND BRANDON   
20110126031100.000|20110126031101.000|CC1|LEFT FOR CHILE.                 
20110126031101.000|20110126031103.000|CC1|ALONG WITH OTHERS HE BEGAN      
20110126031103.000|20110126031104.000|CC1|DRILLING A 2000 FOOT HOLE INTO  
20110126031104.000|20110126031106.000|CC1|THE GROUND, WORKING THREE OR    
20110126031106.000|20110126031109.000|CC1|FOUR DAYS AT A TIME WITHOUT ANY 
20110126031109.000|20110126031112.000|CC1|SLEEP.                          
20110126031112.000|20110126031114.000|CC1|37 DAYS LATER, PLAN B           
20110126031114.000|20110126031115.000|CC1|SUCCEEDED, AND THE MINERS WERE  
20110126031115.000|20110126031116.000|CC1|RESCUED.                        
20110126031116.000|20110126031126.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]                    
20110126031126.000|20110126031128.000|CC1|>> BUT BECAUSE HE DIDN'T WANT   
20110126031128.000|20110126031129.000|CC1|ALL THE ATTENTION, BRANDON      
20110126031129.000|20110126031131.000|CC1|WASN'T THERE WHEN THE MINERS    
20110126031131.000|20110126031132.000|CC1|EMERGED.                        
20110126031132.000|20110126031134.000|CC1|HE HAD ALREADY GONE BACK HOME,  
20110126031134.000|20110126031136.000|CC1|BACK TO WORK ON HIS NEXT PROJECT
20110126031136.000|20110126031138.000|CC1|.                               
20110126031138.000|20110126031140.000|CC1|AND LATER ONE OF HIS EMPLOYEES  
20110126031140.000|20110126031143.000|CC1|SAID OF THE RESCUE, "WE PROVED  
20110126031143.000|20110126031145.000|CC1|THAT SETTLE ROCK IS A LITTLE    
20110126031145.000|20110126031148.000|CC1|COMPANY, BUT WE DO BIG THINGS." 
20110126031148.000|20110126031157.000|CC1|[APPLAUDING]                    
20110126031157.000|20110126031200.000|CC1|>> WE DO BIG THINGS.            
20110126031200.000|20110126031201.000|CC1|FROM THE EARLIEST DAYS OF OUR   
20110126031201.000|20110126031203.000|CC1|FOUNDING, AMERICA HAS BEEN THE  
20110126031203.000|20110126031204.000|CC1|STORY OF ORDINARY PEOPLE WHO    
20110126031204.000|20110126031205.000|CC1|DARED TO DREAM.                 
20110126031205.000|20110126031209.000|CC1|THAT'S HOW WE WIN THE FUTURE.   
20110126031209.000|20110126031210.000|CC1|WE'RE A NATION THAT SAYS, "I    
20110126031210.000|20110126031213.000|CC1|MIGHT NOT HAVE A LOT OF MONEY,  
20110126031213.000|20110126031214.000|CC1|BUT I HAVE THIS GREAT IDEA FOR  
20110126031214.000|20110126031215.000|CC1|A NEW COMPANY."                 
20110126031215.000|20110126031217.000|CC1|I MIGHT NOT COME FROM A FAMILY  
20110126031217.000|20110126031218.000|CC1|OF COLLEGE GRADUATES, BUT I     
20110126031218.000|20110126031220.000|CC1|WILL BE THE FIRST TO GET MY     
20110126031220.000|20110126031222.000|CC1|DEGREE.                         
20110126031222.000|20110126031224.000|CC1|I MIGHT NOT KNOW THOSE PEOPLE   
20110126031224.000|20110126031225.000|CC1|IN TROUBLE, BUT I THINK I CAN   
20110126031225.000|20110126031229.000|CC1|HELP THEM, AND I NEED TO TRY.   
20110126031229.000|20110126031231.000|CC1|I'M NOT SURE HOW WE'LL REACH    
20110126031231.000|20110126031232.000|CC1|THAT BETTER PLACE BEYOND THE    
20110126031232.000|20110126031234.000|CC1|HORIZON, BUT I KNOW WE'LL GET

20110126033429.000|20110126033432.000|CC1|OF INITIATIVE, NOT POLITICAL    
20110126033432.000|20110126033434.000|CC1|CLOUT, DETERMINES WHO SUCCEEDS. 
20110126033434.000|20110126033436.000|CC1|MILLIONS OF FAMILIES HAVE       
20110126033436.000|20110126033437.000|CC1|FALLEN ON HARD TIMES, NOT       
20110126033437.000|20110126033439.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF OUR IDEALS OF FREE   
20110126033439.000|20110126033441.000|CC1|ENTERPRISE, BUT BECAUSE OUR
